getContentSize

public int getContentSize()
Description copied from interface: Content
Retrieve the length of the content. It could be used to determine the number of bytes expected from the input stream and if isContentLoaded is true then getContent().length() and its value is same.

Specified by:
getContentSize in interface Content
Returns:
Length/size of the content; should be non-negative

isContentLoaded

public boolean isContentLoaded()
Description copied from interface: Content
Retrieves whether the content is fully read from the stream or not. If true then it is safe to invoke getContent().

Specified by:
isContentLoaded in interface Content
Returns:
True if and only if the cotent stream has reached EOF.

setContent

public void setContent(Content content)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Description copied from interface: MutableResource
Sets the content of the resource. Setting the content directly will reset the contentAsStream, contentLoaded and contentSize.

Specified by:
setContent in interface MutableResource
Parameters:
content - Can not be null
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If and only if content is NULL
